unnormalised: India celebrated its 75th Republic Day on 26/01/2024, marking a significant milestone in the nation's democratic journey. The event, held at Kartavya Path in New Delhi, commenced at 09:00 AM sharp, with President Droupadi Murmu unfurling the national flag. The ceremony was broadcast live across all major news channels, including DD National and NDTV 24x7.
